participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Emily loves to hang out with her friends and explore new activities.
participant_1.background: i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. they are constantly on my back. i have a part-time job at burger king. i just want to have fun with my friends. i do not drink or do drugs or anything.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Generous and responsible, Jake finds joy in helping others and enjoys spending his free time with animals.
participant_2.background: i work full-time in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue.

content.text: Hi, I don't work or have any pets
